credit_line: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
title: Border
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave
description: Narrow border, probably from a sleeve, embroidered in red, green, blue and yellow silks. The design is a series of squares, each about 2 inches, with a highly conventionalized winged creature. The figure is reserved in the cream ground fabric, with the embroidery forming the background.
name: Border
